game.name: Biovoid
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Biovoid is a creature-building roguelike game that tests your creativity. As a fragile hatchling alone in the abyss, your only objective is to consume and adapt. Will you survive the perils that await and evolve to the top of this alien foodchain?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Biovoid is a creature-building roguelike game that tests your creativity. As a fragile hatchling alone in the abyss, your only objective is to consume and adapt. Will you survive the perils that await and evolve to the top of this alien foodchain?
